projects.name: Snap Stream (Reimplementation)
projects.description: Redesigned and reimplemented an Instagram clone with a modern React.js frontend and Django REST Framework backend. Includes JWT authentication, user profiles, image posting, and social features.

projects.name: Snap Stream
projects.description: Instagram clone featuring sign-up, login/logout functionality, user profiles, image and video posting, and social interactions like liking and commenting.

projects.name: Snake Game
projects.description: Web-based Snake game with grid-based gameplay. Control a snake to consume fruits and grow longer. Game ends on collision with body, obstacles, or boundaries.

projects.name: Harvest Haven
projects.description: Educational agricultural game designed for younger generation in Bahrain and Arab world. Features 3D graphics and teaches sustainable farming techniques.
